name: Blow Job Magazine (A)
description:
Blow Job Magazine (A) is a contemporary abstraction by Melbourne based analogue x digital artist, aspect articulated. 

This piece explores the hypocrisy of the censorship of erotic art on digital platforms by the platform owners, in whose success is largely driven by the mass production, circulation and proliferation of sexualised content and likewise the hyper-sexualisation of young girls and women, as long as it suits the commercial interest of those platforms. Read, SELL ADVERTISING SPACE!
